snippet.title: LUMEN RIDER - OFFICIAL GAMEPLAY TRAILER (RELEASED!)
snippet.description:
Lumen Rider - iOS / GooglePlay  DOWNLOAD NOW
iOS:  https://apps.apple.com/us/app/lumen-rider/id6450874229
GooglePlay:  https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.snowgames.lumenrider
2D Bike Action Packed Shooting Mobile Game.

After Long Years of indie game dev journey, I am so proud to present you "Lumen Rider"!

This game will take advantage of your mobile devices for gaming to the fullest with easy touch screen controls and beautifully created 2D world.

"Discover the immersive world of 'Lumen Rider,' an action-packed mobile game where you become a skilled Lumen Rider, navigating mesmerizing neon landscapes. In this visually stunning arcade adventure, master the art of jumping and shooting to overcome challenging obstacles and enemies. With intuitive controls and smooth gameplay mechanics, 'Lumen Rider' offers an exhilarating experience for players of all skill levels. Compete with friends and players worldwide on the leaderboards, achieve high scores, and unlock special achievements. If you're seeking an adrenaline-pumping journey filled with captivating visuals and skill-based challenges, download 'Lumen Rider' now and embrace the allure of this electrifying mobile game."

Supports 9 Languages: English, Korean, Japanese, French, German, Italian, Arabic, Portuguese, and Spanish.
